name: BigTalk
0:
”Alexa, launch Big Talk”
”Alexa, ask Big Talk for a family topic”
”Alexa, ask Big Talk for a music topic”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: big talk
des:
Cut the small talk and get straight to the big stuff!
This skill will give you some big questions to discuss with friends - these are curated into themes so you can get the specific style of question to suit your mood.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
